pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to 'pomdp-solve' for Partially Observable Markov Decision Processes // Installs 'pomdp-solve', a program to solve Partially Observable Markov Decision Processes (POMDPs) using a variety of exact and approximate value iteration algorithms. Smallwood and Sondik (1973) doi:10.1287/opre.21.5.1071.
